```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Install using:
``` {r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("nrennie/PrettyCols")
```
or
``` {r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("nrennie/PrettyCols")
```

Then load into R:
```{r}
library(PrettyCols)
```

### Moody Blues
```{r, out.width = "60%", fig.align="center"}
prettycols("MoodyBlues")
```

### Pretty Purples
```{r, out.width = "60%", fig.align="center"}
prettycols("PrettyPurples")
```

### Tangerines
```{r, out.width = "60%", fig.align="center"}
prettycols("Tangerines")
```
